channel.title: art on Amateur Homie
channel.description: Recent content in art on Amateur Homie

item.title: A very jolly lynx
item.description: Oh man, even if I’m still trying to study drawing females, I’m really proud how this one turned out! Although I wish I was more consistent with how I draw her, I feel like it’s just luck this time around. Even now, I‚Äôm still struggling with the 3/4 view

item.title: My first ever commission work!
item.description: It’s supposed to be Shigure Soma from an anime called Fruits Basket. Thanks pala ulit, ate!

item.title: Layla sketches
item.description: Trying to practice proportions and basics. Honestly don’t know what I was going for here. I still don’t know how to pose the limbs and arms.

item.title: Cipheriana
item.description: Something I drew thanks to Spinel’s idea of an Ace Combat x Monster Hunter dating sim where you romance Legiana-Cipher. (there’s a route where she kills you, she still hasn’t lost her mercenary instincts) ‚ÄúYou didn‚Äôt kill enough Belkans, anon‚Äù There‚Äôs really something off with the colored version, I‚Äôll redo this in the future‚Ä¶

item.title: Ao Lie
item.description: I’ve been enjoying Fei Ren Zai recently. I really like the show’s short format, perfect for a slice of life animation. Here’s Ao Lie!

item.title: Inteleon used Snipe Shot!
item.description: just imagine trying to jump while encumbered with a 20kg-heavy anti-tank rifle

item.title: Malugud a Pascu, Raeny-kun!
item.description: heya raen! if you’re reading this, i just wanted to say how much i want to thank you. so here’s a merry christmas from my hometown, Pampanga! (p.s.: I really do hope you get to meet your cousins back in Malaysia to celebrate the holidays)

item.title: Can the world please just stop for a moment?
item.description: Weeks of nonstop exams and electronics took a toll on my motivation. Plus, I realized that I always regretted wasting my time on worthless youtube videos and other distractions on the internet. bruhhhhhthian because odogaron red dog and galm emblem red dog yes

item.title: Layla nanaman ulet
item.description: patulong nga also she got herself a brand new (as in hindi gamit) sando for her upcoming birthday this thursday! kung magpapagameshow ako, hindi jacket yung consolation kundi sando nagpapicture siya nang suot suot yung BAGONG sando niya. Yun nga lang, nalimutan niayng hindi kasya sa facebook dp yung buong katawan niya.

item.title: Ginhawa
item.description: Finally, after an entire month of non-stop long exams and projects, I could finally take a break from acads! Layla can go home and take a long rest at last. Commuting back home, Layla sure saw a lot of restaurants along Maginhawa street that she even thought of dining out along with her friends! ‚Ä¶ If only she had the money to do so‚Ä¶ I guess that‚Äôs life for Layla! Even the tricycle driver knew that she doesn‚Äôt have the money for the fare and bailed out on her!

item.title: October sketches
item.description: i wish i had more time to practice drawing human anatomy, but since my schedule and every other brick wall hindering me aren’t giving me time, I unfortunately have to go with these. lord, sana biyayaan niyo po ako ng isang magandang asawa. Gets mo ba? inamogago pero parang may tama yung gumawa nito eh when u flip and land a hit on hunter who‚Äôs already low on hp peace out yo parang ganito yung naririnig ko parati sa bibig ng iba eh

item.title: Bros, she's not coming back...üò¢
item.description: capcom i plead you to bring back leviathans back in world Rough sketch Somewhat final sketch Linework the whole tone is blue because it‚Äôs sad üò¢ this is a complete circuit diagram comprised of a resistor, battery, and an LED. Just a continuation of my crap joke from last post
Is this even possible? I’m not an electronics engineer so I’m pretty clueless will this wiring diagram result into a short circuit?

item.title: Boost me up, fam!
item.description: just a dumb thought while playing D:OS 2 Sketch despite thinking of this brilliant idea, she regrets having to carry and balance an entire person on top of her.

item.title: Rathians, Legiana, and Kulve Taroth
item.description: mon hun dudels rathian is such a beautiful woman when u sipp Legiana‚Äôs a very emotional monster. She won‚Äôt hesitate to scream in the face of danger, nor hide a wide smile (and maybe even blush) when she sees a hunter proposing to her. Taroth‚Äôs (a) glutton!

item.title: Valstrax
item.description: Sketch. Note to self, always zoom out to have awareness of line thickness in the big picture. Colored version. I‚Äôm really happy how this one turned out! After defeating another Free Erusea uprising in 2014, Mobius 1 finally retired from his military duties. Unfortunately, he was then captured by Belkan scientists. He was subjected unto different experiments and his consciousness was transferred into a bioengineered dragon capable of flying at mach speed.

item.title: X-02F Flying Wyvern
item.description: Capable of autonomous or manned flight, this next generation of fighter aircraft will be the main antagonist of Ace Combat 8. The X-02F Flying Wyvern is a product of Belkan bioengineering in an effort to exact revenge against Osea a few decades after the Belkan’s bitter defeat. Sketch. I don‚Äôt know why I did this I completely regret doing this.

item.title: First Furry OC?
item.description: I was actually trying to make her look like a lynx. Please be nice to her! She‚Äôs really happy to get a fresh new sando (actually used, don‚Äôt tell her) for her birthday! While the tenant is busy with his ranked match, Layla opts to sleep at the counter of the store. Huli ka balbon! magsiligo na kayo mga bata
